item.title: zkLogin: when ZKP is not enough
item.content:encoded: Zero-knowledge proofs can't fix what they can't see. Our security analysis of zkLogin reveals that real-world ZK authorization systems are only as secure as the authentication infrastructure they're built on.

item.title: Brave launches most powerful search API for AI to date
item.content:encoded: Brave launches the LLM Context API, the most powerful search API for AI to date. With Brave's grounding data, cheaper open-weight models beat ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google AI Mode.

item.title: The Brave Search API’s integration into Snowflake enables agentic web search for enterprise customers
item.content:encoded: Brave Search API is now integrated into Snowflake, enabling agentic web search for enterprise AI tools like Cortex Code and Cortex Agents.

item.title: Brave Games: A reality-style heist built for the open Web
item.content:encoded: Brave Games is a multi-week, community-powered vault heist competition launching in February 2026, built in partnership with Fanon, Midnight Network, and Mythical Games.

item.title: Brave is the only search API offering true Zero Data Retention, unlocking growth and privacy compliance for AI companies
item.content:encoded: The only search API offering true Zero Data Retention. While competitors funnel queries to Google or Bing, the Brave Search API is built with privacy at its core, and powered by an independent index.

item.title: Brave overhauls adblock engine, cutting its memory consumption by 75%
item.content:encoded: Brave has overhauled its Rust-based adblock engine to reduce memory consumption by 75%, bringing better battery life and smoother multitasking to all users.

item.title: AI browsing in Brave Nightly now available for early testing
item.content:encoded: Today, we're announcing the availability of Brave's new AI browsing feature in Brave Nightly for early experimentation and user feedback. When ready for general release, this agentic experience aims to turn the browser into a truly smart partner, automating tasks and helping people accomplish more.

item.title: The .brave Website-Building Challenge
item.content:encoded: More than 1,200 builders stepped up to create, experiment, and push the boundaries of what’s possible with .brave domains, Brave Wallet, BAT, and onchain Web experiences.

item.title: Announcing the new Skills feature in Leo, Brave’s in-browser AI assistant
item.content:encoded: Today we're announcing a powerful new feature for Brave Leo: Skills. With Skills, your favorite prompts and AI-powered tasks are just a keyboard shortcut away.

item.title: Verifiable Privacy and Transparency: A new frontier for Brave AI privacy
item.content:encoded: Brave Leo offers a new capability for cryptographically verifiable privacy and transparency by deploying LLMs with NEAR.AI Nvidia-backed Trusted Execution Environments.
